overview:
Alex has spent thousands of hours developing web applications and working within various industries to understand the interplay between technology and business. He previously worked in private banking technology in London, New York and Geneva but turned his back on life at a large corporation to build We Make Websites, with the aim of using modern web working practices to solve client problems in a variety of industries.

Alex also runs a photography studio in London and has a BSc in Computer Science with Business and Management from the University of Manchester.

degrees.subject: Computer Science with Business and Management
